title: The Family Feast
description: The Family Feast: 12 More Indian Recipes present the Curry Cravings (TM) approach towards traditional holiday staples. Recipes include: Persimmon TeaMarinated Paneer & Feta chunksFried tomatoesNigella spiced verts with almonds & goat cheesePotato hash donutsSpicy stuffingRosemary-infused Jamaican style chicken Hot cranberry-cherry sauceRogan-josh (lamb)Pav breadFig & pine nuts tartBottle gourd halwaGoodie-bag: Triple chocolate biscotti!
author: Nandita Godbole
